DOC.detailed_description: In human breast milk , infant formulas 98 % milk fat form triglyceride , contain saturate unsaturated fatty acid esterify glycerol . Fatty acids human milk-fat highly specific positional distribution glycerol backbone specific configuration know major contribution efficacy nutrient absorption . Palmitic acid ( C16:0 ) , major saturate fatty acid , predominantly esterify sn-2 ( β ) position triglyceride human milk . In contrast , palmitic acid standard infant formula esterify sn-1 sn-3 position . Infants fed high sn-2 palmitic acid formula softer stool , less constipation well calcium absorption compare standard infant formula . InFat™ structure triglyceride fat ingredient high level palmitic acid sn-2 position . The primary objective trial demonstrate feed Chinese term infant , formula proportion palmitate sn-2 position comparable human milk , reduce calcium-soaps formation .
